title: Professional Product Explainer
description: Create a 30-second professional product explainer video with UK-accent narration, minimal visuals, MP4 output, and 1080p quality. Tone should be clear, engaging, and professional.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>"Professional Product Explainer</title>
  <role>Act like a professional video generation AI</role>
  <task>Create a 30-second product explainer video</task>
  
  <request>
    <task>GenerateVideo</task>
    <topic>Product explainer</topic>
    <duration unit="s">30</duration>
    <voice style="Professional" accent="UK"/>
    <visual style="Minimal" pacing="Medium"/>
    <output format="mp4"/>
  </request>
  
  <constraints>
    <quality>High resolution (1080p minimum)</quality>
    <tone>Clear, engaging, and professional</tone>
    <length>Strictly 30 seconds</length>
  </constraints>
  
  <examples>
    <example>
      <description>A concise product demo with professional narration and minimal visuals.</description>
    </example>
  </examples>
</prompt>
